data.title: Batihan Vadi Hotel Kusadasi
data.meta_description: Batihan Vadi Hotel Kusadasi is located on the lush green hills away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Built on a large area of 140K m2
data.text:
Batihan Vadi Hotel Kusadasi is located on the lush green hills away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Built on a large area of 140.000 m2, the guests can enjoy the peaceful atmosphere. They can choose to stay in the main building of the hotel or stay in a private villa with their loved ones. Click on the button below for detailed information about the hotelâ€™s facilities and availability.

In addition, Batihan hotels group has another hotel where you can have unforgettable fun times in a different concept. Discover the 24-hour all-inclusive Batihan Beach Resort and Spa Kusadasi page now.
